nodes.title: Article 5
nodes.summary: This partial document (Article 5) lists the specific benefits and services available to enterprises that have obtained the "Small and Medium Enterprise" (PME) card. The main points covered are the advantages granted to certified PMEs, including access to investment code benefits, a credit guarantee fund, microfinance, a one-stop shop for business creation, special financing conditions, public procurement and subcontracting opportunities, free information services from OPEC, personalized import-export assistance, access to Congolese PME representation offices abroad, and a favorable tax regime.
